DataElement.preferredName: Confirmation Next Menstrual Cycle Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The confirmed onset date of the next menstrual bleeding (menstruation) in an ovulating woman.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified._Subsequent; immediately following in time or order._The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)_An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having been established or verified.:Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.:The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.

The Menstrual Cycle involves regularly recurring hormonal changes and physiologic endometrial changes during the reproductive period in human females, and some primates, and culminates in partial sloughing of the endometrium (menstruation) in the absence of fertilization. For most women, one cycle takes 28 days. (NCI)

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/7/17 jk unretired; still needed for NWU2015-06-04-Menst tab.  10/21/2016, created for DCP SVAR, wz.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
